original_text:
But to the wicked God says:
    “What right have you to recite my statutes
    or take my covenant on your lips?
korean_text: 악인에게는 하나님이 이르시되 네가 어찌하여 내 율례를 전하며 내 언약을 네 입에 두느냐

sentences.original_text: But to the wicked God says:
What right have you to recite my statutes
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 내 율례를 말할 무슨 권리가 있느냐

sentences.original_text: or take my covenant on your lips?
sentences.korean_translation: 내 언약을 네 입에 담을 무슨 권리가 있느냐
